text: this is lukla the Gateway to Mount
Everest in Nepal the Himalayas rise all
around you and snow clad Peaks shot into
the sky
now it's from this town that climbers
begin their trek to base camp but it
isn't easy to get here there is an
airport but many people have called it
the world's scariest Airport and if you
see a plane taking off here we
understand why it's a small aircraft
that has to go full-speed on a runway
that's sloping downward and which has a
steep fall after that so the pilot has
to time it perfectly because the plane
has to take off right before that edge
and landing is almost as difficult
earlier today when we landed there was
spontaneous applause for the pilots from
all of the people on board now there
aren't any flights taking off for
landing at the moment because the
airport is closed it's too cloudy for
any planes to get in here and that
happens quite often so it's only a very
narrow window on most days when people
can get in and out of look love
